DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the relative bioavailability of Paddock Laboratories, Inc.'s test formulation of Moexipril/ Hydrochlorothiazide 15mg/25mg tablets with a reference formulation UnireticÂ®(Moexipril/ Hydrochlorothiazide) 15mg/25mg tablets, under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Relative Bioavailability of Moexipril HCl/Hydrochlorothiazide in Healthy Adult Volunteers Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: Good health as determined by lack of clinically significant abnormalities in health assessments performed at screening Positive test results for HIV or Hepatitis B or C History of allergy or sensitivity to Moexipril, Hydrochlorothiazide or related drugs
